## DataSourceFormula

### Methods

- cancelDataRefresh() — DataSourceFormula
- forceRefreshData() — DataSourceFormula
- getAnchorCell() — Range
- getDataSource() — DataSource
- getDisplayValue() — String
- getFormula() — String
- getStatus() — DataExecutionStatus
- refreshData() — DataSourceFormula
- setFormula(formula) — DataSourceFormula
- waitForCompletion(timeoutInSeconds) — DataExecutionStatus
